member.name: F:Pokemon_3D_Server_Core.Server_Client_Listener.Players.Player.PvPRules.Default
member.summary:
PvP Rules: Default
No unobtainable Pokemon.

member.name: F:Pokemon_3D_Server_Core.Server_Client_Listener.Players.Player.PvPRules.Legendary_Clause
member.summary:
PvP Rules: Legendary Clause
No Legendary Pokemon.

member.name: F:Pokemon_3D_Server_Core.Server_Client_Listener.Players.Player.PvPRules.Custom_Legendary_Clause
member.summary:
PvP Rules: Custom Legendary Clause
Only legendary Pokemon allowed are the legendary birds and the legendary dogs

member.name: F:Pokemon_3D_Server_Core.Server_Client_Listener.Players.Player.PvPRules.Species_Clause
member.summary:
PvP Rules: Species Clause
A player cannot have two Pokemon with the same National Pokedex number on a team.

member.name: F:Pokemon_3D_Server_Core.Server_Client_Listener.Players.Player.PvPRules.Evasion_Clause
member.summary:
PvP Rules: Evasion Clause
A Pokemon may not have the moves Double Team or Minimize in its moveset.

member.name: F:Pokemon_3D_Server_Core.Server_Client_Listener.Players.Player.PvPRules.OHKO_Clause
member.summary:
PvP Rules: OHKO Clause
A Pokemon may not have the moves Fissure, Guillotine, Horn Drill, or Sheer Cold in its moveset.

member.name: F:Pokemon_3D_Server_Core.Server_Client_Listener.Players.Player.PvPRules.Moody_Clause
member.summary:
PvP Rules: Moody Clause
A team cannot have a Pokemon with the ability Moody.

member.name: F:Pokemon_3D_Server_Core.Server_Client_Listener.Players.Player.PvPRules.Accuracy_Clause
member.summary:
PvP Rules: Accuracy Clause
A Pokemon may not have the moves Sand-Attack, Smoke Screen and Kinesis.

member.name: F:Pokemon_3D_Server_Core.Server_Client_Listener.Players.Player.PvPRules.Custom_League
member.summary:
PvP Rules: Custom League
1. Default Clause - No unobtainable Pokemon.
2. Custom Legendary Clause - Only legendary Pokemon allowed are the legendary birds and the legendary dogs.
3. Save Clause - No offline saves.
4. Species Clause - A player cannot have two Pokemon with the same National Pokedex number on a team.
5. OHKO Clause - A Pokemon may not have the moves Fissure, Guillotine, Horn Drill, or Sheer Cold in its moveset.
6. Evasion Clause - A Pokemon may not have the moves Double Team or Minimize in its moveset.
7. Accuracy Clause - A Pokemon may not have accuracy lowering moves.
